featureRequests.title: LessonCraft Media Dashboard
featureRequests.description: Web dashboard on command center showing all R2 media assets, play audio, view images, completion status

featureRequests.title: Cover images for all content cards
featureRequests.description: Generate beautiful LDS devotional art for each CFM week, Easter episode, Fireside, and Morning Light card.
featureRequests.notes: 52 CFM covers + 8 new fireside art uploaded to R2. All wired into catalog.

featureRequests.title: Content standing approval — build freely via catalog API
featureRequests.description: Jeff approved blanket content production as long as it goes through R2 + Cloudflare Workers catalog system.

featureRequests.title: Easter artwork — v3 LDS devotional style locked in
featureRequests.description: Approved style: soft diffused light, muted palette, approachable Christ, no halos/crosses/baroque. Generator: Gemini.

featureRequests.title: Share Card feature
featureRequests.description: ShareCardRenderer renders 1080x1350px share images. Share button in episode player toolbar.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 4687441

featureRequests.title: Web Preview /daily/{id} pages
featureRequests.description: Cloudflare Worker serving /daily/{episodeId} pages with OG/Twitter meta tags, artwork hero, audio player, App Store button.
featureRequests.notes: Deployed to api.aituned.io. Share URL now uses aituned.io/listen/{id}.

featureRequests.title: Intent-driven Home screen redesign
featureRequests.description: New Home screen: time-of-day greeting, Morning Light banner, intent cards, Continue Listening, This Week's Study.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 9f7cdb4. Jeff approved the design.

featureRequests.title: Artwork similarity audit
featureRequests.description: Pull all R2 images, compare pairs visually. Flag duplicates/too-similar.
featureRequests.notes: Gallery at 222 local files with improved diversity across 9+ collections.

featureRequests.title: Voice re-generation with new roster
featureRequests.description: Re-generate all existing audio with locked-in voice roster.
featureRequests.notes: 267 files re-generated, 0 failures. All voices now correct.

featureRequests.title: lessoncraft.app domain routing for deep links
featureRequests.description: Set up lessoncraft.app DNS for deep links and Apple Universal Links.
featureRequests.notes: lessoncraft.app belongs to EcomTrackify — NOT our domain! Share URLs now use aituned.io/listen/{id} instead.

featureRequests.title: Read-along narration text in documentary segments
featureRequests.description: Add synchronized text display during audio playback for documentary episodes
featureRequests.notes: Commit 85f0c00

featureRequests.title: CFM Teaching Coach Enhancement
featureRequests.description: After Jared's closing, add CTA for 'How to Teach This Week's Lesson'. Warm close with varied encouragement.
featureRequests.notes: Jeff approved. Sample generated for Week 7 (commit d9c7a0b). Full 52-week rollout pending.

featureRequests.title: JD Art Gallery — in-app browser + print ordering
featureRequests.description: Jacque Dubois Fine Art Gallery inside LessonCraft. Browse by collection, set wallpapers, order prints via Printful.
featureRequests.notes: Commits 36c69f2 + bae4890. 120 pieces on R2.

featureRequests.title: Printful print-on-demand integration
featureRequests.description: White-label print store via Printful. 14 products created with 4 size variants each.
featureRequests.notes: Printful account live. Print Store UI fully built with 7 product types. Stripe webhook Worker deployed (89f7890c). Still needs: wrangler secret put STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET.

featureRequests.title: Subscription system (StoreKit 2)
featureRequests.description: 3 tiers: $4.99/mo, $39.99/yr, $1.99/mo student. PaywallView + SubscriptionManager.
featureRequests.notes: isDemoMode=true for beta.

featureRequests.title: Stripe webhook for Cloudflare Worker

featureRequests.notes: Deployed as worker version 89f7890c. Printful token bug fixed (standardized to PRINTFUL_API_TOKEN).

featureRequests.notes: Rebuilt Feb 12 with all 133 real artworks. LDS art separated to /lds path. CDN cache battle resolved.

featureRequests.title: Multi-product print store upgrade

featureRequests.title: Gallery category browser with filter chips
featureRequests.description: JDGalleryView with 9 category filter chips (All, Jesus Christ, Art Nouveau, Sacred, etc.). Each chip has icon + title + count badge.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 227275d. 133-artwork catalog uploaded to R2 REMOTE.

featureRequests.title: Universal share for all episode types

featureRequests.title: In-app Privacy Policy + Terms of Service
featureRequests.description: Native in-app Privacy Policy and Terms of Service screens. Required for App Store submission.

featureRequests.title: HVAC Research skill for FieldLearner content
featureRequests.description: Content scraping toolkit: blog scraper, topic classifier, YouTube indexer, search aggregator. 77 articles + 30 videos + 245 sources.
featureRequests.notes: Skill at ~/Jackbot/skills/hvac-research/. Content shared with JCI bot.

featureRequests.title: aituned.io B2B enterprise rewrite
featureRequests.description: Rewrote aituned.io as B2B enterprise AI platform. 6 industries. Removed all faith-based content.
featureRequests.notes: Deployed to Cloudflare Pages.

featureRequests.title: TikTok account + content strategy
featureRequests.description: TikTok account created for Gospel Tuned brand. Strategy: 2-3x/day art reveals, scripture cards, Morning Light clips.
featureRequests.notes: Account created. Need TikTok handle from Jeff. Video pipeline built. Strategy research complete.

featureRequests.title: Print store orientation-aware previews + frame mockups
featureRequests.description: Jeff wants: orientation-aware previews, frame mockup around image, size selector showing actual image, frame color picker, product type selector.
featureRequests.notes: Wall preview now renders frame borders with selected frame color. Further polish needed.

featureRequests.title: LDS art separated from public gallery website
featureRequests.description: gallery.html: 79 public artworks. lds.html: 35 LDS-specific pieces at /lds path.
featureRequests.notes: Keeps gallery appropriate for all-faith audience.

featureRequests.title: Instructor-led lesson prompt rewrite (Grok-quality)
featureRequests.description: Rewrote generateTopicSection and createTopicOutline for parallel generation with Points structure: Description → Scripture WITH TEXT → Question → Discussion Guidance. 2-3 Points per section.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 3ceed00. 126 insertions, 89 deletions. Sub-agent lesson-prompt-rewrite. End-to-end tested: GPT-4o-mini produces 4000+ word lessons with 3 Points per section.

featureRequests.title: CFM duration scaling + enhanced assembly
featureRequests.description: cfmDurationScaling() returns section/point counts and word budgets by duration. Enhanced assembly: separate opening/closing hymns, testimony invitation, weekly challenge.
featureRequests.notes: Commit cdb5a24. Sub-agent cfm-lesson-polish.

featureRequests.title: CFM Week date range display
featureRequests.description: shortDateRange computed property on CFMWeekCard shows 'Feb 9–15' or 'Jan 27 – Feb 2'. Current week bold + gold.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 40124c5.

featureRequests.title: ProfileView cleanup (support email + Privacy Policy)
featureRequests.description: Fixed support email to support@tredtechnologies.com. Privacy Policy now uses in-app view instead of external URL.
featureRequests.notes: Commit cf8074b. Sub-agent profileview-fix.

featureRequests.title: TikTok art reveal video pipeline
featureRequests.description: ffmpeg-based video generation: blur reveal + Ken Burns pan/zoom, 1080x1920 vertical, 20s. Batch processing by collection.
featureRequests.notes: Scripts: tiktok-art-reveal-final.sh + batch-generate-tiktok.sh. 3 sample videos generated. Sub-agent tiktok-pipeline.

featureRequests.title: Gallery thumbnail generation + lazy loading
featureRequests.description: 400px JPEG thumbnails for all artworks, uploaded to R2 at artwork/gallery/thumbs/{id}.jpg. Gallery HTML updated for lazy-loading.
featureRequests.notes: 400px chosen over 800px for bandwidth savings. Sub-agent gallery-thumbnails.

featureRequests.title: jacquedubois.art image protection
featureRequests.description: Right-click disabled, CSS pointer-events:none on images, Cloudflare hotlink protection, firewall rule blocking direct /artwork/ access.
featureRequests.notes: Gallery pages remain accessible — only direct image URLs blocked.

featureRequests.title: App Store Connect submission metadata
featureRequests.description: Full App Store Connect metadata package: name, subtitle, description, keywords, What's New, privacy labels, reviewer notes.
featureRequests.notes: Commits 2d1624b + b8d825d. Saved at ~/developer/LessonCraft/Marketing/AppStoreSubmission.md

featureRequests.title: Delete lessoncraft-proxy worker permanently
featureRequests.description: Ghost worker kept hijacking api.aituned.io route (3 times). Deleted permanently to prevent recurrence.
featureRequests.notes: Root cause: wrangler deploy of old worker was overwriting routes. Worker deleted entirely.

featureRequests.title: GospelTunedCore Swift Package extraction
featureRequests.description: Extract shared Swift Package core from LessonCraft for multi-faith apps. Foundation for Catholic, Baptist, Methodist, Lutheran, Buddhist, Bahá'í apps.
featureRequests.notes: Sub-agent gospel-tuned-package spawned (Sonnet). Still running.

featureRequests.title: Automated App Store screenshots via simulator
featureRequests.description: Automated screenshot capture for all key screens at 1290x2796 (iPhone 16 Pro Max). Suppressing notification dialog.
featureRequests.notes: Sub-agent appstore-screenshots spawned (Sonnet). Still running.

featureRequests.notes: himalaya still works for jackbotwoolums@gmail.com. Only jeff.woolums@gmail.com needs migration to gog.

featureRequests.title: About the Artist page on jacquedubois.art
featureRequests.description: Dedicated About page for Jacque Dubois persona with nav update (Gallery / Sacred Art / About). Anti-theft script included.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 9a9d61f. Deployed to jacquedubois.art. Uses /about/index.html to avoid Cloudflare Pages clean-url redirect loop.

featureRequests.title: Launch Day Playbook for App Store submission

featureRequests.notes: File: ~/developer/LessonCraft/marketing/LAUNCH-DAY-PLAYBOOK.md. Committed in 6c2eea7.

featureRequests.title: SCREENSHOT_MODE env gating for App Store screenshots
featureRequests.description: Added SCREENSHOT_MODE environment variable to suppress notification permission prompts during automated screenshot capture.
featureRequests.notes: Included in commit 6c2eea7.

featureRequests.title: Tools/AI news video analysis pipeline
featureRequests.description: Extracted and ranked 11 tools from 'AI News: This Video Model Has Everyone Freaked Out!' video. Analysis saved for Jeff's morning review.
featureRequests.notes: Sub-agent tools-review complete. Saved to ~/Jackbot/memory/tools-review-2026-02-14.md. Top finding: GPT 5.3 Codeex Spark builds games in 50 seconds.

featureRequests.title: ProfileView remaining fixes (support email + privacy link)
featureRequests.description: Line 1074: Privacy Policy link still points to api.aituned.io/privacy (should use in-app view). Lines 1062-1068: Contact emails still support@aituned.io (should be support@tredtechnologies.com).
featureRequests.notes: Discovered during Feb 13 session review. feature-20260213-4 marked complete but these specific lines still need updating.

featureRequests.title: Fix nightly build cron (completes in 16ms without work)
featureRequests.description: Nightly build cron jobs complete in 16ms without doing any actual work. Needs debugging to ensure sub-agents are actually spawned.
featureRequests.notes: Noted in Feb 13 memory. The nightly-build-session cron DOES work (spawned 10+ sub-agents tonight), but the original nightly-build cron may be redundant or misconfigured.

featureRequests.title: Art agent context overflow fix
featureRequests.description: Art agent (agent:art:main) hit 316K tokens > 200K limit. Session needs reset or context management.
featureRequests.notes: Error: 400 invalid_request_error - prompt is too long: 316435 tokens > 200000 maximum. Discovered during nightly audit.

featureRequests.title: Community Stories system (web + API + iOS UI)
featureRequests.description: User-submitted faith stories: web form, API endpoints, in-app browsing + detail screens, consent checkboxes.
featureRequests.notes: Web: https://lessoncraft.net/share. API: /api/stories/* . iOS: Home card + Be Inspired section. Seeded 30 sample testimonies.

featureRequests.title: Stories Admin Dashboard
featureRequests.description: Admin UI to review/approve/reject stories with status counts, filters, private fields, and moderation notes.
featureRequests.notes: Live: https://aituned.io/admin/stories/ (requires X-Admin-Key). Worker deployed version 1376c9bd (commit 8f73b2f).

featureRequests.title: Lesson translation (60+ languages) for ALL lesson types
featureRequests.description: Translate lessons into 60 languages with English/Translated toggle, share/export both versions, caching and scripture link rewriting.
featureRequests.notes: Globe button in lesson detail header. Recently-used languages pinned. Shon (Romania) targeted as early beta.

featureRequests.title: Image variant system for artwork (thumb variants + ?w= param)
featureRequests.description: Generate and upload 2 JPEG variants per image and serve via Worker with ?w= parameter for massive data savings.
featureRequests.notes: 113 images × 2 sizes = 226 JPEG variants uploaded to R2. ~30–50x smaller payloads for thumbs.

featureRequests.title: PDF Export fix (proper letter-page rendering)
featureRequests.description: Fix WKWebView PDF export templates to render at letter width (612px) instead of phone viewport.
featureRequests.notes: Added viewport meta tag to all 3 PDF templates. Commit 5d7a370.

featureRequests.title: Art copyright-risk audit + vetting tool
featureRequests.description: Audit JD Gallery for copied famous artworks; remove risks; build vetting tool that flags famous painting titles and prompts.
featureRequests.notes: Removed 52 pieces total (46 quality review + 6 high copyright risk). Built art-vetting-tool.py (50+ famous artworks DB).

featureRequests.title: Artist Engine + SOP (originality-first art generation)
featureRequests.description: 8-part prompt framework + mandatory SOP-ART-CREATION.md, review queue, safe prompt exclusions; perspective is primary originality tool.
featureRequests.notes: Files: ~/Jackbot/scripts/artist-engine/* and SOP-ART-CREATION.md. Never reference artist names or painting titles in prompts.

featureRequests.title: Port native iOS LessonCraft features to Universal Flutter app (go-live gate)
featureRequests.description: Jeff directive: move everything from native iOS app into universal Flutter app before declaring it live-worthy.
featureRequests.notes: Overnight sub-agents swift-canyon + delta-summit spawned. Flutter P2/P3 features already shipped; remaining: onboarding/stories/translation parity.

featureRequests.title: Storage policy enforcement (move generated assets to G-DRIVE)
featureRequests.description: Migrate large generated assets (artwork, voice models, SDKs, build artifacts) to G-DRIVE; keep internal SSD for brain + active source only.
featureRequests.notes: 27GB freed. Artwork (4.6GB), voice models (9GB), Android SDK (5.9GB), Gradle cache (4.8GB) moved. TermLinkky archived then removed locally.
